languages.text: "Немочи знают об этой скверне больше, чем мы, и это надо исправить. Следует отловить какое-то количество мутантов и принудить к сотрудничеству — так мы поймем, с чем имеем дело".

"The retches know more about this pestilent growth than we do, something we must quickly rectify. We should capture some of these mutants and force them to cooperate — that way we can learn what it is we are dealing with."
languages.original_text: "Немочи знают об этой скверне больше, чем мы, и это надо исправить. Следует отловить какое-то количество мутантов и принудить к сотрудничеству — так мы поймем, с чем имеем дело".

traits.locale_text: "The sickly creatures know more about this filth than we do, and we have to amend that. We should catch some mutants and force them to cooperate — so we will get to know what we are dealing with."
"The sickly creatures know more about this filth than we do, and we have to amend that. We should catch some mutants and force them to cooperate — so we will get to know what we are dealing with."

"The retches know more about this pestilent growth than we do, something we must quickly rectify. We should capture some of these mutants and force them to cooperate — that way we can learn what it is we are dealing with."

"The sickly creatures know more about this pestilent growth than we do, something we must amend quickly. We should catch some mutants and force them to cooperate — that way we can learn what it is we are dealing with."

"The sickly creatures know more about this pestilent growth than we do, something we must amend quickly. We should catch some mutants and force them to cooperate — that way we can learn what it is we are dealing with."

"The retches know more about this pestilent growth than we do, something we must quickly rectify. We should capture some of these mutants and force them to cooperate — that way we can learn what it is we are dealing with."

"The retches know more about this pestilent growth than we do, something we must quickly rectify. We should capture some of these mutants and force them to cooperate — that way we can learn what it is we are dealing with."

"The retches know more about this pestilent growth than we do, something we must quickly rectify. We should capture some of these mutants and force them to cooperate — that way we can learn what it is we are dealing with."

languages.text: “这些丑恶种比我们更了解这种邪恶滋生的细节，我们必须尽快解决这个问题。我们应该抓住一部分丑恶种人，逼迫他们合作。这样一来，我们就会更加了解我们面对的问题。”
languages.original_text: "The retches know more about this pestilent growth than we do, something we must quickly rectify. We should capture some of these mutants and force them to cooperate — that way we can learn what it is we are dealing with."

traits.locale_text: “这些丑恶种比我们更了解这种邪恶滋生的细节，我们必须尽快解决这个问题。我们应该抓住一部分丑恶种人，逼迫他们合作。这样一来，我们就会更加了解我们面对的问题。”
“这些畸形的生物比我们更了解这种邪恶的增生，我们必须尽快了解更多信息。我们应该抓住一部分变种人，逼迫他们合作。这样一来，我们就会更加了解我们面对的问题。”

languages.text: «Las abominaciones saben más que nosotros sobre este crecimiento pestilente, algo que debemos enmendar rápidamente. Deberíamos atrapar a algunos mutantes y obligarlos a cooperar: así sabremos a qué nos enfrentamos».
languages.original_text: "The retches know more about this pestilent growth than we do, something we must quickly rectify. We should capture some of these mutants and force them to cooperate — that way we can learn what it is we are dealing with."

traits.locale_text: «Las abominaciones saben más que nosotros sobre este crecimiento pestilente, algo que debemos enmendar rápidamente. Deberíamos atrapar a algunos mutantes y obligarlos a cooperar: así sabremos a qué nos enfrentamos».

languages.text: 「病弱な生物たちは、私たちよりもこの疫病の増殖について知っているはず。早く修正しなければならないわ。何体かの変異体を捕まえて、無理やりでも協力させるべきだね...そうすることで、何と戦っているのかを分かってくるはず」
languages.original_text: "The retches know more about this pestilent growth than we do, something we must quickly rectify. We should capture some of these mutants and force them to cooperate — that way we can learn what it is we are dealing with."

traits.locale_text: 「病弱な生物たちは、私たちよりもこの疫病の増殖について知っているはず。早く修正しなければならないわ。何体かの変異体を捕まえて、無理やりでも協力させるべきだね...そうすることで、何と戦っているのかを分かってくるはず」
「病弱な生物たちは、私たちよりもこの疫病の増殖について知っているはず。早く修正しなければならないわ。何体かの変異体を捕まえて、無理やりでも協力させるべきだね...そうすることで、何と戦っているのかを分かってくるはず」

languages.text: « Ces infâmes en savent plus long que nous sur ce fléau végétal, et nous devons remédier à cela au plus vite. Emparons-nous de quelques mutants et forçons-les à coopérer. Ils doivent à tout prix nous révéler la nature de notre ennemi. »
languages.original_text: "The retches know more about this pestilent growth than we do, something we must quickly rectify. We should capture some of these mutants and force them to cooperate — that way we can learn what it is we are dealing with."

traits.locale_text: « Ces infâmes en savent plus long que nous sur ce fléau végétal, et nous devons remédier à cela au plus vite. Emparons-nous de quelques mutants et forçons-les à coopérer. Ils doivent à tout prix nous révéler la nature de notre ennemi. »

languages.text: "Die Speier wissen mehr über dieses pestilente Wachstum als wir. Das müssen wir schleunigst ändern. Wir sollten einige dieser Mutanten einfangen und zur Kooperation zwingen. So können wir in Erfahrung bringen, womit wir es zu tun haben."
languages.original_text: "The retches know more about this pestilent growth than we do, something we must quickly rectify. We should capture some of these mutants and force them to cooperate — that way we can learn what it is we are dealing with."

traits.locale_text: "Die Speier wissen mehr über dieses pestilente Wachstum als wir. Das müssen wir schleunigst ändern. Wir sollten einige dieser Mutanten einfangen und zur Kooperation zwingen. So können wir in Erfahrung bringen, womit wir es zu tun haben."

"Die kränklichen Kreaturen wissen mehr über diese abscheuliche Wucherung als wir. Das müssen wir schleunigst beheben. Wir sollten ein paar Mutanten fangen und sie zwingen, zu kooperieren. So können wir in Erfahrung bringen, womit wir es zu tun haben."

languages.text: "Leşler, bu baş belası büyümeye dair bizden daha çok şey biliyor. Bir an önce bu işi düzeltmeliyiz. Bu mutantlardan birkaçını yakalayıp onları iş birliğine zorlamalıyız. Böylece neyle karşı karşıya olduğumuzu öğrenebiliriz."
languages.original_text: "The retches know more about this pestilent growth than we do, something we must quickly rectify. We should capture some of these mutants and force them to cooperate — that way we can learn what it is we are dealing with."

traits.locale_text: "Leşler, bu baş belası büyümeye dair bizden daha çok şey biliyor. Bir an önce bu işi düzeltmeliyiz. Bu mutantlardan birkaçını yakalayıp onları iş birliğine zorlamalıyız. Böylece neyle karşı karşıya olduğumuzu öğrenebiliriz."
